headline: Is There Now An Opportunity In Gartner (IT) After A 70% One Year Share Price Fall
summary: If you are wondering whether Gartner's share price now reflects attractive value or lingering risk, the numbers behind the stock are worth a closer look. The share price closed at US$149.34, with returns of a 7.4% decline over 7 days, a 36.9% decline over 30 days, a 37.0% decline year to date, a 70.0% decline over 1 year, a 54.1% decline over 3 years and an 18.2% decline over 5 years, which has likely shifted how many investors are thinking about both upside and downside. Recent coverage has...

headline: Trade Desk Stock Falls After Downgrade. Why the Slump Is Getting Even Worse.
summary: Trade Desk  stock was falling early Thursday, extending its terrible run, after its revenue outlook disappointed.  The company has faced a revenue growth slowdown and intense competition from the likes of  Amazon.com  and  Alphabet  ‘s Google.  In the earnings call, CEO Jeff Green said there had been “a sustained weakness among some large consumer packaged goods companies as well as some global auto companies.”

headline: A Look At Gartner (IT) Valuation After Weaker Q4 Results And Softer 2026 Outlook
summary: Gartner (IT) is back in focus after weaker fourth quarter revenue, a softer 2026 outlook, and pressure on its Consulting segment, all against fresh global tariff headlines that have weighed on sentiment. See our latest analysis for Gartner. Those weaker results and the softer 2026 outlook have fed directly into price action, with a 30 day share price return of 36.9% and a year to date share price return of 37%. Meanwhile, the 1 year total shareholder return of 70% and 3 year total shareholder...
